"Can you help you???"said alpha while she ran towards Azure blade


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Azure: That's it, Skullgrin, conquer, destroy, and die like a scrap 
> piece! (The vehemence in his voice was obvious) Hell Drak, do you 
see 
> any backup coming? I'm getting pretty low on energy...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Michael Coburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > ::Hell Drak/Skullgrin::
> > 
> > Hell Drak went closer to AzureBlade and Skullgrin, ready to 
clobber
> > Skullgrin, and at the same time, ready to hold up AzureBlade in 
case 
> he was
> > depleted of energy.
> > 
> > Skullgrin, meanwhile, was still trying to fight it.
> > 
> > "Conquest....destruction......!!!" he yelled, trying to slowly 
get 
> up.
> > 
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@y...>

> >

> > > Please Skullgrin! Let me help you! (He felt That Skullgrin was 
> getting
> > > away from his contact...) Do you not see all that you could 
reach? 
> Let
> > > me give you the power!
> > >
> > > AzureBlade came out of the dreamy state he was in:
> > > Hell Drak, be ready to knock him down if he makes just one 
move. I
> > > have been wrong on him... for now... but I hope I have 
installed 
> doubt
> > > in his cause...
> > >
> > > He then opened a comm to the other Maximals:
> > > This is AzureBlade. I am with Hell Drak and Decepticon 
Skullgrin 
> and I
> > > need some energy fast!
> > >

> > > >
> > > > Skullgrin was still trying to fight it.
> > > >
> > > > "Decep...ticons.........FOREVER!" He yelled, holding his 
fists.

> > > > From: <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>

> > > > > life... Blind destruction... That very way is the reason 
your
> > > powers
> > > > > have not reached their full extent... Learn to control

> > > To
> > > > > fight for a just cause... If you can master yourself, then 
you 
> can
> > > > > find true power! Hold on to me, Skullgrin...
> > > > > He gave some energy to Skullgrin, enough to wake him up, 
but
